text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde fhura Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgir wari ga shɨshɨgi gumgi, nde mben rɨvɨri. Mbe fhura nde raaŋ shɨv, buni vhuuiŋra nde suanga. Mben ndɨkndɨgi guari mbu vhen ki, mbe fhura nde guiguigirim, nde mbe zɨn ŋgɨrim, mbe nden farfagir zav mbui. Mbe ruaŋruaŋgi feiŋ fara muuŋgiap, fhura sipsiva rɨgin wari shargia rui. Mbe mba sipsiva rɨgɨnan wari shargip ŋgɨp, sipsivi han ŋgɨp mben suigɨrga.
